text: @CDCgov @PublicHealth #PreventingChronicDisease #PublicHealthResearch #PracticeAndPolicy #CallForPapersAs we continue to strive for a healthier and more equitable society, it's crucial that we prioritize the prevention of chronic diseases. The CDC's call for papers on public health research, practice, and policy is a vital step in this direction. Let's work together to advance knowledge and action in this critical area!
